TemplateId.description: This will be filled in by the system

TemplateName.description: This will be filled in by the system

Name.description: Descriptive name for the game setting

Description.description: Brief overview of the game setting's theme, tone, and key features

StartingLocationId.description: Will be filled in during instantiation

Npcs.description: List of NPCs in the game scenario

Description.description: Brief description of character (role, motivation, notable traits)

Locations.description: List of locations in the game scenario

Description.description: Brief description of the location (type, purpose, notable features)

Quests.description: List of quests in the game scenario

Description.description: Brief description of the quest (goal, key NPCs, locations involved)

Events.description: List of events in the game scenario

Summary.description: Brief description of what happens during this event

TriggerType.description: The type of trigger that will cause this event to occur

TargetTime.description: For Time triggers - when the event should occur (e.g., '3 days after game start')

TimeType.description: Whether the time is absolute or relative

LocationId.description: For LocationChange/FirstLocationEntry triggers - will be filled during instantiation

LocationName.description: For LocationChange/FirstLocationEntry triggers - name of the location where event triggers

Context.description: Additional information about the event's purpose or special conditions
